passive.name: Long Night
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>. Increases the wearer's Skill and Ultimate DMG by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong>. After the wearer uses their Skill or Ultimate, they gain Somnus Corpus. Upon triggering a follow-up attack, Somnus Corpus will be consumed and the follow-up attack DMG increases by <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong>.
